entry.title: RT pbillingsby: Deploying dApps to @arweaveteam Permaweb is becoming less complicated as more new tools are bring created. All you need is a few cents...
entry.summary: RT pbillingsby Deploying dApps to @arweaveteam Permaweb is becoming less complicated as more new tools are bring created. All you need is a few cents & a static build. Whether it's CLI or GUI, your dApps are a few clicks or commands away from permanence. Heres the tools that make that possible:

entry.title: Re Focus 2: is where our new partnership with @CoinviseCo has added significance. We're exploring other pathways into the community such as public que...
entry.summary: Re Focus 2: is where our new partnership with @CoinviseCo has added significance. We're exploring other pathways into the community such as public quests and tasks, and fun activities like contests. And a powerful tool like Coinvise, can help make this as frictionless as possible.

entry.title: Re Focus 1: looks like enhancing our existing Scholarships initiative that @dabit3 created. We're also building out a cohort-based Fellowships program...
entry.summary: Re Focus 1: looks like enhancing our existing Scholarships initiative that @dabit3 created. We're also building out a cohort-based Fellowships program under @axisonexyz. The aim is to create a suite of distinct pathways into Developer DAO, that cater to different contexts.

entry.title: Re The Genesis NFT has a supply of only 8k, and the forked smart contract doesn't limit wallets to 1 each. So we realized early on, that there was a n...
entry.summary: Re The Genesis NFT has a supply of only 8k, and the forked smart contract doesn't limit wallets to 1 each. So we realized early on, that there was a need to create easier ways for people to join the DAO. After months of hard work across the community, we've narrowed down our focus

entry.title: D_D x COINVISE 🎉 🎉 Access to the DAO has been a huge priority for us. Part of our efforts to address this, was launching the $CODE token. We're ...
entry.summary: D_D x COINVISE 🎉 🎉 Access to the DAO has been a huge priority for us. Part of our efforts to address this, was launching the $CODE token. We're also forming relationships that can facilitate this vision — which is why we’re proud to announce our newest partner @CoinviseCo ↓

entry.title: RT Elena: The maintenance and advancement of open-source software is crucial for the crypto community. To increase our support of public goods in web3...
entry.summary: RT Elena The maintenance and advancement of open-source software is crucial for the crypto community. To increase our support of public goods in web3, @a16z crypto is committing $300,000 for open-source developers in the next round of @Gitcoin Grants (GR15). https://a16zcrypto.com/supporting-public-goods-with-gitcoin-grants/

entry.summary:
Re Rules ℹ️
1. Follow @developer_dao 2. Retweet the first tweet in this thread 3. Submit your meme entry by REPLYING to the first tweet in this thread, and include your wallet address or ENS. Note: You must complete all three steps in order to be eligible. 1 entry per-person.
